page.title: The Tailors Choice
page.text: Clothe yourself in the finest metals\n\nBy RWTema
This mod is currently in early beta. No balancing has yet been attempted. Bugs will happen.

A good tinkerer should know that the world is a dangerous and evil place with many things wishing to kill you. While tools and weapons are important, a good set of armor is vital to a tinkers continuous survival.

Simple non-metal armor is a tinkerers first starting point for protection. These simple armor pieces are created in the part builder using the appropriate wooden patterns. However, this can only be done using simple non-metal materials, or relatively soft metals, such as iron and copper.

Armor made from even moderately hard metals cannot be made in the part builder. You must use a smeltery in order to melt down the metals into a molten liquid form (see Mighty Smelting). The molten metal can then be cast into an armor using the appropriate block cast.

Different types of armor are more effective at stopping attacks than others. This is measured by the damage resistance of the armor,

A tinkers natural inclination is to go for the strongest armors as soon as possible, but even weak armor has its important uses. If the damage of an attack is below the armors 'damage threshold', then it will be absorbed at a resistance rate of 80%. This means even weak armor will be incredibly strong against weak attacks.\n\nIf an armors natural resistance is already above 80%, then the damage threshold will not be calculated.
Like a tinkers tools, an armor piece can be upgraded to give better stats and abilities.

Protection modifiers will grant additional protection against certain types of damage. This reduction is applied separately from the armors resistance and damage threshold. It is important to realize however that, all the protection modifiers of an armor set cannot reduce an attack by more than 80%.

page.desc: Protection against 'normal' damage. This will protect against fire, explosion, projectiles and any physical based attacks. It won't protect against non-physical damage such as magical, poison or wither attacks.
Protects against shock waves caused by explosions.
Protection against damage caused by ranged projectiles..
Protection against magical or non-physical attacks. Such as poison, potions of harming, wither attacks, etc.
Protection against the withering effect. This will not protect against the direct wither attack.

page.text: These modifiers do not absorb damage but give special properties.

page.desc: Enables you to see perfectly in dark areas.
Boosts the players health while being worn.
Arm servos boost base attack damage.
Absorbs the velocity of an attack to prevent knockback.

page.text: These modifiers require other mods to be installed.
